ARABIC: وَٱخْفِضْ لَهُمَا جَنَاحَ ٱلذُّلِّ مِنَ ٱلرَّحْمَةِ وَقُل رَّبِّ ٱرْحَمْهُمَا كَمَا رَبَّيَانِى صَغِيرًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Take them under your wing, out of mercy, with due humility and say: 'Lord, show mercy to them as they did in looking after me when I was small.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And look after them with kindness and love, and say: "O Lord, have mercy on them as they nourished me when I was small."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and be humble and tender to them and say: "Lord, show mercy to them as they nurtured me when I was small."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Be humble and merciful towards them and say, "Lord, have mercy upon them as they cherished me in my childhood."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And lower your wing humbly for them, with mercy, and pray, “My Lord! Have mercy on them both, the way they nursed me when I was young.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And lower unto them the wing of submission and humility through mercy, and say: "My Lord! Bestow on them Your mercy as they did bring me up when I was young."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And make yourself submissively gentle to them with compassion, and say: O my Lord! have compassion on them, as they brought me up (when I was) little.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and lower to them the wing of humbleness out of mercy and say; 'My Lord, have mercy upon them, as they raised me up when I was little.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And lower unto them the wing of submission through mercy, and say: My Lord! Have mercy on them both as they did care for me when I was little.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and treat them with humility and tenderness and say, "Lord, be merciful to them both, as they raised me up when I was little."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And lower unto them the wing of meekness out of mercy, and say: O my Lord! have mercy on the twain even as they brought me up when young.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Lower the wing of humility to them, mercifully, and say, ‘My Lord! Have mercy on them, just as they reared me when I was [a] small [child]!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And, out of kindness, lower to them the wing of humility, and say: "My Lord! bestow on them thy Mercy even as they cherished me in childhood."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And lower unto them the wing of submission and humility through mercy, and say: "My Lord! Bestow on them Your Mercy as they did bring me up when I was small."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And lower to them the wing of humbleness out of mercy and say: 'My Lord, be merciful to them, as they raised me since I was little'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And lower to them the wing of humility, out of mercy, and say, “My Lord, have mercy on them, as they raised me when I was a child.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And lower to them the wing of humility out of mercy and say, "My Lord, have mercy upon them as they brought me up [when I was] small."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [17:24] And lower to them the wing of humility, show them your submissive side, out of mercy, that is, on account of your affection for them, and say, ‘My Lord, have mercy on them, just as they, had mercy on me when [they], reared me when I was little’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And lower unto them the wing of submission) humble yourself to them (through mercy) be compassionate towards them, (and say: My Lord! Have mercy on them both) if they are Muslims (as they did care for me when I was little).
